svg.text: This demo illustrates how to use the MobileModel actor to do remote control. The model inside the MobileModel actor is the control algorithm. The algorithm may need to be changed or adjusted. This platform allows you to change the algorithm remotely and send to it via the PushConsumer actor. During executing any number of changes may be issured.

entity.name: FileReader
entity.doc: Read a text file and output the string of it.
